history.narrative: Law 1-61, the “Revenue Act of 1975—Third Amendment,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-215, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 19, 1975 and January 13, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 6, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-91 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
